Title: Turn grief into strength, carry out Chairman Mao's behests and carry the proletarian revolutionary cause through to the end
Designer: Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House Propaganda Poster Group (上海人民美术出版社宣传画组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Mao dies on 9 September, 1976. There is grief and public mourning, but also a sense of insecurity and even some relief. Nobody can predict who will come to power now, or which political direction will prevail.
